improvement_list.improvement_desc: The test case ([9, 9, 9], [1, 0, 0, 1]) will cause an out-of-bounds error in line 28 because the expected output has four elements while the digits list only has three elements.  The program should add validation to ensure the lengths of digits and expected match before comparison.
The loop will not terminate if all digits are equal to 9, which could lead to an infinite loop. Consider adding a counter or check to limit the loop iterations.
